reviews.review_msg: I sat in on a few of Miss Jiang's classes and found she was a natural teacher. And I couldn't take my eyes off her. lol.

Absolutely wonderful teacher, I would totally take any of her class again! She is very helpful, uses awesome examples, and goes the extra mile as a teacher. It is rare to see someone who likes there job so much, and shares their passion!
shes very nice.
No Comments
Multiple weekly assignments and quizzes are a lot of work but help with language retention in the long run, so it's not that bad. She doesn't quiz you on things you haven't seen in the course before.

I don't know what to say. Although the overall content of the course is easy to understand but the way how she grades are kinda making me sad. Getting one wrong on the question will bring your grade dramatically down. Everyone says its GPA booster but tbh it was pretty annoying course to even get a A-. There might be better option for GPA booster

She uses words that she doesn't teach, tells you that you don't need to know something and then tests you on it. Lots of errors throughout the course material. Grading is shady, she'll never show you anything other than the mark. Grading system is flawed, some letters have a 4% range, some have 5%. If you don't know a different dialect, don't take.

CHIN100 steadily increases in difficulty as you go along, but with enough practice I think you will be fine. Billie is a tough marker, and I felt I often had to ask for points which she should have given in the first place. I don't feel that the workload of this course was too much, but it is maladjusted to online format.

DISCLAIMER: Billie did not teach this class but her TA Ms.Tang did, however it showed on SIS that Billie was teaching so ya anyways Ms. Tang was awesome and got me so excited about Chinese I always wanted to go to class! she expects a lot from you but she's so lovely my whole class loved her, honestly the best class ive taken!

This class is easy! i don't understand why there are so many negative comments. There are quizzes which are easy if you read the textbook and as for the vocab quizzes, just memorize what she tells you to memorize and you will get a 100%

An absolutely great prof! Very passionate about teaching and very helpful too! She also shares a great deal of her life experiences with traveling around the world and it totally made me interested to travel to China to learn more Chinese!
Great teacher!

if you have a knack for languages, then this class is for you! Billie is really fun and warm hearted. She designed the class herself, I found the layout very organized and systematic. The end of the class is challenging...you may want to find chinese friends for help!
WORST COURSE I'VE EVER TAKEN
very tough
Not very interesting course.
Be careful as she can be very tough.
Excellent prof.  She is enthusiastic about the material, and explains the content very clearly.  This course was always fun to attend... definitely recommend this prof.
No Comments
She's an awesome teacher, the material isn't hard... she's soo nice and cheerful and makes the class interesting by telling neat things relevant to the course
So pleasant. Always smiling. So proud of Chinese Culture. Strict during tests.
